name: FilmInfo
0:
”Alexa Open Film Info”
”Alexa Ask Film Info which the six most popular movies are”
”Alexa Ask Film Info if Tom Hanks is an actor”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: film info
des:
It helps users find out detailed info from the movie world:

 - which are the most popular movies
 - if someone is an actor or an actress and which are the movies he or she is known for

To be detailed as skill set is improving.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
